tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT NOT NULL,
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
    message_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE flagged_messages (
    flag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT,
    moderator_id INT,
    flag_reason VARCHAR(255),
    flag_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
  message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id UUID,
  receiver_id UUID,
  message_text TEXT,
  message_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   player_name STRING);

CREATE TABLE message (message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   message_text STRING,
   message_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   player_id INT);

CREATE TABLE moderator (moderator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   moderator_name STRING);

CREATE TABLE moderation_log (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   message_id INT,
   moderator_id INT,
   action STRING,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT UNIQUE,
    email TEXT UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE moderation_issues (
    issue_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id UUID,
    reported_by UUID,
    issue_description TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE reported_messages (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id UUID,
    reported_by UUID,
    report_reason TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE moderation_actions (
    action_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id UUID,
    moderator_id UUID,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_date TIMESTAMPTZ
)
